name: Compact and Programmable M12 RTD Temperature Transmitters
category: Temperature > RTD (PT100) Probes, Elements and Assemblies > Industrial RTD Probes
short_description: Programmable Transmitter, M12 Connection, 4 to 20 mA Output, -50 to 120Â°C (-58 to 248Â°F)
description: RTD 100Î© sensor with built-in transmitter and 1/8 NPT is programmable by a computer. The configuration kit required for programming is M12TX-CONFIG. This unique probe is ideal for areas with space limitations where traditional head connections are too large to fit. The M12 thread design offers a secure industrial connection.

specifications.Process Connection: 1/8 NPT male thread or G1/8 thread
specifications.Connection: M12x1 male in accordance to VDE0627 (output connection)
specifications.Sensor: RTD PT100 class A up to 300Â°C in accordance to IEC751
specifications.Sensor Break Monitoring: Selectable: Upscale (>21.0 mA) or downscale (<3.6 mA) action
specifications.Environment Conditions - Degree of Prote: IP65 and IP67 in accordance to IEC60529
specifications.Accuracy - Transmitter: Maximum of Â±0.2Â°C or Â±0.2% of span
specifications.Accuracy - Sensor: class A in accordance to IEC751
specifications.Accuracy - Temperature Influence (Deviat: Maximum of Â±0.3Â°C/ 25Â°C or Â±0.3% of span/25Â°C
specifications.Range Configurations: It is possible set the input temperature range (span) by the M12TX-CONFIG configuration kit (PC with OS WindowsÂ® required)
specifications.Minimum Span: 50Â°C [if the zero value is set between one of these values: -40Â°C, -20Â°C, 0Â°C, 20Â°C, 40Â°C (-40Â°F, -4Â°F, 32Â°F, 68Â°F, 104Â°F), the minimum span is 20Â°C (68Â°F) rather than 50Â°C (122Â°F)]
specifications.Response Time: Diameter 3 mm (0.12") <3.5 seconds, diameter 6 mm (0.24") <13 seconds (test in water to IEC751- time for reaching 63.2% of instantaneous temperature change)

M12TXC-PT100-3MM-13MM-1/8NPT.description: Temperature transmitter, output 4 to 20 mA, 3 mm (0.11') diameter, 13 mm (0.5') long, 1â8 NPT

M12TXC-PT100-3MM-24MM-1/8NPT.description: Temperature transmitter, output 4 to 20 mA, 3 mm (0.11') diameter, 24 mm (0.94') long, 1â8 NPT

M12TXC-PT100-3MM-13MM-G1/8.description: Temperature transmitter, output 4 to 20 mA, 3 mm (0.11") diameter, 13 mm (0.5") long, G1â8 thread

M12TXC-PT100-3MM-24MM-G1/8.description: Temperature transmitter, output 4 to 20 mA, 3 mm (0.11") diameter, 24 mm (0.94") long, G1â8 thread

M12TX-CONFIG-SET.description: Accessory to configure the M12TX series devices through a PC with Windows 10 or higher and the TTX-Platform software

Description

RTD 100Î© sensor with built-in
transmitter and 1/8 NPT is
programmable by a computer.
The configuration kit required for
programming is M12TX-CONFIG.
This unique probe is ideal for
areas with space limitations where
traditional head connections
are too large to fit. The M12
thread design offers a secure
industrial connection.  
  
**Specifications**  
**Body:** Stainless steel AISI 316L  
**Probe Length:** 13 and 24 mm (0.51 and 0.94")  
**Diameter:** 3 mm (0.12")  
**Probe Type:** Thermowell AISI 316L SS  
**Process Connection:** 1/8 NPT male thread or G1/8 thread  
**Connection:** M12x1 male in accordance to VDE0627 (output connection)  
**Sensor:** RTD PT100 class A up to 300Â°C in accordance to IEC751  
**Range:** -50 to 110Â°C (-58 to 248Â°F) Tmax, Electronic: 80Â°C (176Â°F)  
**Sensor Break Monitoring:**  
Â Â Â Â **Selectable:** Upscale (>21.0 mA) or downscale (<3.6 mA) action  
Â Â Â Â **Sensor Short-Circuit:** Fixed to downscale (<3.6 mA) action  
**Output:** 4 to 20 mA  
**Factory Default:** 4 to 20 mA = 0 to 100Â°C (32 to 212Â°F)  
**Permissible Load:** 700 @ 24 Vdc [RLo= (Vsupply-8,5)/0,020]  
**Response Time (90%):** <50 ms  
**Isolation In - Out:** Non-isolated  
**Power Supply:** 8.5 to 32 Vdc (polarity protected)  
**Environment Conditions:**  
Â Â Â Â **Temperature:** -40 to 80Â°C (-40 to 176Â°F) (for plastic body)  
Â Â Â Â **Relative Humidity:** 0 to 100%  
Â Â Â Â **EMC:** In accordance to EN 61326  
Â Â Â Â **Degree of Protection:** IP65 and IP67 in accordance to IEC60529  
**Accuracy:**  
Â Â Â Â **Transmitter:** Maximum of Â±0.2Â°C or Â±0.2% of span  
Â Â Â Â **Sensor:** class A in accordance to IEC751  
Â Â Â Â **Temperature Influence (Deviation from 20Â°C):** Maximum of Â±0.3Â°C/ 25Â°C or Â±0.3% of span/25Â°C  
**Supply Voltage Influence:** Negligible  
**Range Configurations:** It is possible set the input temperature range (span) by the M12TX-CONFIG configuration kit (PC with OS WindowsÂ® required)  
**Zero Adjustments:** Any value between -50 to 50Â°C (-58 to 122Â°F)  
**Minimum Span:** 50Â°C [if the zero value is set between one of these values: -40Â°C, -20Â°C, 0Â°C, 20Â°C, 40Â°C (-40Â°F, -4Â°F, 32Â°F, 68Â°F, 104Â°F), the minimum span is 20Â°C (68Â°F) rather than 50Â°C (122Â°F)]  
**Sensor Error Compensation:** Over 2 points (maximum 1% of span)  
Â Â Â Â **Factory Setting:** 0 to 100Â°C/ sensor break >21 mA (upscale)  
**Response Time:** Diameter 3 mm (0.12") <3.5 seconds, diameter 6 mm (0.24") <13 seconds (test in water to IEC751- time for reaching 63.2% of instantaneous temperature change)
